Make an Appointment

Chimu Homeopathy is an independent practice run by David S. Kim. To make your first appointment, please email David or call him at 612-460-7692.

Please note: Appointments are conducted at the People's Movement Center in Minneapolis. In lieu of an in-person visit, David can also consult with you over the phone or via Skype.

Pricing
Initial Consultation (up to 2 hours): $200
Follow-up (45 minutes): $100

Location and Directions

About the Homeopath

David Kim (he/they) is a homeopath who locates his roots in the Pacific, Okinawa, Korea, and Scotland. Love, belief and chimu (the heart) ground his practice. He is drawn—by genealogy and by training—to the intersections of Indigenous language revitalization, Land, history and medicine. David is completing training at the Northwestern Academy of Homeopathy.

Chimu Homeopathy is run by David S. Kim, a healing-justice focused homeopath with roots in Scotland and the Pacific.

Visit us in person at the People's Movement Center.
Or find us elsewhere: Email | Facebook | Instagram
